title: Child, 8, shot himself in hand on near northeast side after finding gun in bedroom
content:
INDIANAPOLIS, Ind. (Aug. 21, 2015)– Police say an 8-year-old was shot in the hand Friday evening on the city’s near northeast side.
Officers responded to the 3500 block of North Temple Avenue around 4:45 p.m.
According to police at the scene the child found the gun in a bedroom, picket it up, and shot himself in the hand.
There is no word at this time as to whether any charges will be filed.
